frozen.name: python3.8-num2words
frozen.shortDescription: Modules to convert numbers to words. 42 --> forty-two
frozen.longDescription: num2words is a library that converts numbers like 42 to words like forty-two. It supports multiple languages (see the list below for full list of languages) and can even generate ordinal numbers like forty-second
